results.content: Starting section is very weak. I'm editing my review from 1 to 4 later on all sections  are interesting. The course is easy and smooth. It is amazingly designed for beginners to get grip on it. Have patience with him you will have more than basic understanding. on UNIX.

Einige einfache Kommandos werden meiner Meinung nach in schlechter Reihenfolge erklärt.

results.content: Learned basic commands and there use cases.  This course is really good if you want a definition of each command and what it does. This course will get the ball rolling.

results.content: The sessions  were short crisp. However, I wanted a little more deeper information. The examples where less and the ones available were mundane. I would suggest you have to talk about vi editor in the begining so that audience will be able to create files and practice what they are learning.
